description:
Don't drop your tools when high on the route. These elastic umbilical leashes rotate independently on the innovative Gyro™ swivel, so they don't get twisted or tangled as you climb. Attach to your harness and to your tools with either the cord loops girth hitched to the tool shafts or spikes, or use the Nano carabiners to create a detachable system.

  • Gyro™ swivel uses 3 independent connections to prevent twisting
  • Elastic expands and contracts to stay out of the way
  • 2 small carabiners and small loops provide attachment options
  • Small is 85-129cm. Large is 92-147cm
  • Not designed to catch falls or support your weight when hanging
name: Camp X-Gyro Ice Tool Leash - Unisex
